com.example.bookshelf_initialpage.database

Class MySQLiteHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.example.bookshelf_initialpage.database.MySQLiteHelper

  • public class MySQLiteHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Class responsible for creating and upgrading the tables in the database and encapsulates low-level information such as the column and database names.
    Author:
    Clay
